data.title: Me and Rumi
data.meta_description: Me and Rumi - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document provides an introduction and overview of the book "Me & Rumi" which contains translated excerpts from "The Discourses of Shams-i Tabrizi". It summarizes that the book presents first-hand accounts of Shams, Rumi's spiritual companion, which provide insight into his vivid personality and role in transforming Rumi from a scholar to a Sufi poet. This counters previous stereotypes created through secondary sources that mythologized Shams. The introduction aims to bring Shams to life through his own words for the first time.
